body:
All submissions for this problem are available.

Two integers A and B are the inputs. Write a program to find GCD and LCM of A and B.

Input

The first line contains an integer T, total number of testcases. Then follow T lines, each line contains an integer A and B.

Output

Display the GCD and LCM of A and B separated by space respectively.

Constraints

  • 1 ≤ T ≤ 1000
  • 1 ≤ A,B ≤ 1000000

Example

Input
3 
120 11
10213 312
10 3

Output

1 1320
1 3186456
1 30
languages_supported: ADA, ASM, BASH, BF, C, C99 strict, CAML, CLOJ, CLPS, CPP 4.3.2, CPP 4.9.2, CPP14, CS2, D, ERL, FORT, FS, GO, HASK, ICK, ICON, JAVA, JS, LISP clisp, LISP sbcl, LUA, NEM, NICE, NODEJS, PAS fpc, PAS gpc, PERL, PERL6, PHP, PIKE, PRLG, PYPY, PYTH, PYTH 3.4, RUBY, SCALA, SCM chicken, SCM guile, SCM qobi, ST, TCL, TEXT, WSPC
